Stock Photography

It's important to use high quality graphics and photography in your design projects. These sites are offered to students as sources for use in your school projects.

You may use images listed below without attribution for your assignments. That said, if your teacher directs you to include attribution, please do so. What the teacher states in class is the law of the land.

SVG and Icons

  • IconMonstr
  • OpenMoji
  • Simple Icons
  • The Noun Project
  • Super Tiny Icons

Vector Logos

  • Brands of the World
  • World Vector Logo — Brand logos free to download

Photography

General Stock Photos

  • Death to the Stock Photo
  • EveryPixel
  • Gratisography
  • Growth Text
  • HD Wallpapers
  • IM Free
  • ISO Republic
  • jay mantri
  • Libre Stock
  • Little Visuals
  • Magdeleine
  • MMT Stock
  • Nappy
  • NASA Image Library
  • Negative Space.co
  • picjumbo
  • Picography
  • Pexels
  • Pixabay - Free Images
  • Public Domain Images
  • Skuawk
  • Snapwire Snaps
  • SplitShire
  • Startup Stock Photos
  • Stockified
  • Stockio
  • StockSnap
  • Stock Up
  • Superfamous Images
  • Unsplash

Food Photos

  • Foodie’s Feed
  • Food Shot.co

Travel Photos

  • BucketListly - Travel Photos

Vintage Photos

  • New Old Stock
  • NYPL Digital Collections

  • The Pattern Library
